name: remitxpress
description: Secure, fast, and affordable international money transfer platform powered by blockchain technology

scripts.install:all: npm run install:server && npm run install:client && npm run install:contracts
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:contracts
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client && npm run test:contracts
scripts.deploy:contracts: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy:contracts:sepolia: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network sepolia
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.clean: npm run clean:server && npm run clean:client && npm run clean:contracts
scripts.clean:contracts: cd contracts && rm -rf node_modules cache artifacts

author: RemitXpress Team
